mapper.select: SELECT count(1) AS count FROM dr_institution AS institution

SELECT institution.inst_id as instId, institution.inst_no as instNo, institution.inst_password as instPassword, institution.inst_salt as instSalt, institution.inst_name as instName, institution.inst_website as instWebsite, institution.inst_address as instAddress, institution.inst_contract_url as instContract_url, institution.inst_license_no as instLicense_no, institution.inst_organization_no as instOrganization_no, institution.inst_telephone as instTelephone, institution.inst_email as instEmail, institution.inst_legal_person as instLegal_person, institution.inst_cert_no as instCert_no, institution.inst_cert_type as instCert_type, institution.inst_legal_person_phone as instLegal_person_phone, institution.inst_bank_income_id as instBank_income_id, institution.inst_bank_income_card_id as instBank_income_card_id, institution.inst_bank_income_code as instBank_income_code, institution.inst_bank_income_account as instBank_income_account, institution.inst_bank_income_account_owner_name as instBank_income_account_owner_name, institution.inst_bank_income_telephone as instBank_income_telephone, institution.inst_bank_income_province as instBank_income_province, institution.inst_bank_income_city as instBank_income_city, institution.inst_bank_income_branch as instBank_income_branch, institution.inst_bank_income_status as instBank_income_status, institution.inst_bank_pay_id as instBank_pay_id, institution.inst_bank_pay_card_id as instBank_pay_card_id, institution.inst_bank_pay_code as instBank_pay_code, institution.inst_bank_pay_account as instBank_pay_account, institution.inst_bank_pay_account_owner_name as instBank_pay_account_owner_name, institution.inst_bank_pay_telephone as instBank_pay_telephone, institution.inst_bank_pay_province as instBank_pay_province, institution.inst_bank_pay_city as instBank_pay_city, institution.inst_bank_pay_branch as instBank_pay_branch, institution.inst_bank_pay_status as instBank_pay_status, institution.inst_card_type as instCard_type, institution.inst_card_attribute as instCard_attribute, institution.inst_data_url as instData_url, institution.inst_license_address as instLicense_address, institution.inst_license_expire_date as instLicense_expire_date, institution.inst_business_scope as instBusiness_scope, institution.inst_summary as instSummary, institution.inst_yyzz_url as instYyzz_url, institution.inst_zzjgz_url as instZzjgz_url, institution.inst_swdjz_url as instSwdjz_url, institution.inst_jsxkz_url as instJsxkz_url, institution.inst_jgxyz_url as instJgxyz_url, institution.inst_icp_url as instIcp_url, institution.inst_hyxkz_url as instHyxkz_url, institution.inst_frzjz_url as instFrzjz_url, institution.inst_frzjf_url as instFrzjf_url, institution.inst_status as instStatus, institution.inst_createtime as instCreatetime, institution.inst_modifytime as instModifytime FROM dr_institution AS institution WHERE inst_id = #{instId}
